org.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT projects.id) FROM projects LEFT OUTER JOIN project_statuses ON project_statuses.project_id = projects.id LEFT OUTER JOIN projects AS parents_projects ON parents_projects.id = projects.parent_id LEFT OUTER JOIN enabled_modules ON enabled_modules.project_id = projects.id LEFT OUTER JOIN custom_values ON custom_values.customized_type = "$1" AND custom_values.customized_id = projects.id LEFT OUTER JOIN custom_fields AS custom_fields_custom_values ON custom_fields_custom_values.id = custom_values.custom_field_id

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT projects.id) FROM projects LEFT OUTER JOIN project_statuses ON project_statuses.project_id = projects.id LEFT OUTER JOIN projects AS parents_projects ON parents_projects.id = projects.parent_id LEFT OUTER JOIN enabled_modules ON enabled_modules.project_id = projects.id LEFT OUTER JOIN custom_values ON custom_values.customized_type = "$1" AND custom_values.customized_id = projects.id
